root.name: Super Robot Wars 64
root.description: Featured Series A list of the anime series which are featured in the game. Series that premiered in the Super Robot Wars series in this game are marked with "(new)". Series that can only be obtained by linking up with Super Robot Wars Link Battler are marked with an asterisk (*).Mobile Suit Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam: The 08th MS Team (new) Mobile Suit Gundam 0083: Stardust Memory Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Mobile Suit Gundam ZZ Mobile Suit Gundam: Char's Counterattack Mobile Suit Gundam F91* Mobile Fighter G Gundam New Mobile Report Gundam Wing New Mobile Report Gundam Wing: Endless Waltz Mazinger Z Great Mazinger UFO Robo Grendizer Getter Robo Getter Robo G Shin Getter Robo (manga version) Super Electromagnetic Robo Combattler V Invincible Super Man Zambot 3* Invincible Steel Man Daitarn 3 Demon God of War Goshogun* Six God Combination Godmars (new) Aura Battler Dunbine Super Beast Machine God Dancougar Blue Comet SPT Layzner Giant Robo: The AnimationÂ (new) Banpresto Originals (original characters created for the game) New FeaturesCombination Attacks. There are some units who can perform special attacks when they are adjacent to each other. Although most of them represent attacks performed in their original anime (God Gundam's/Rising Gundam's Love Love Tenkyoken) or generic attacks with a protagonist and a sub-character (Dunbine's/Billvine's Twin Aura Attack), some combination attacks exist between seperate protagonists in the same timeline (Zeta Gundam's/ZZ Gundam's Double Mega Launcher) and even extend to similar protagonists from a single production team who are otherwise unrelated (Zambot 3's/Daitarn 3's Super Combination Attack).
